title: TimeHolder's wallet contract defines a basic implementation of DepositWalletInterface to provide a way to store/deposit/withdraw tokens on this contract according to access rights. Here deposit/withdraw are allowed only by TimeHolder contract.
name: TimeHolderWallet

abiDocs.name: claimContractOwnership
abiDocs.notice: Finalize ownership pass.     * Can only be called by pending owner.

inputs.name: _identifier
inputs.description: is a manager's identifier. 0x0 is not allowed.

abiDocs.name: lookupManager
abiDocs.details: Returns manager's address by its identifier (type).
abiDocs.notice: Will crash if no manager in the system with given identifier.

inputs.name: _to
inputs.description: address of the next owner. 0x0 is not allowed.

abiDocs.name: changeContractOwnership
abiDocs.notice: Prepares ownership pass.     * Can only be called by current owner.

abiDocs.name: setContractsManager
abiDocs.details: Setter for ContractsManager. Force overrides currect manager.

abiDocs.name: destroy
abiDocs.details: Destroy contract and scrub a data

inputs.name: _from
inputs.description: an address of a sender who is willing to transfer her resources

inputs.name: _amount
inputs.description: an amount of tokens (resources) a sender wants to transfer

abiDocs.name: deposit
abiDocs.notice: Deposits some amount of tokens on wallet's account using ERC20 tokens

abiDocs.name: transferContractOwnership
abiDocs.details: Direct ownership pass without change/claim pattern. Can be invoked only by current contract owner

abiDocs.name: destroy
abiDocs.notice: Call `selfdestruct` when contract is not needed anymore. Also takes a list of tokens that can be associated and have an account for this contract

inputs.name: _to
inputs.description: an address of a receiver who is willing to get stored resources

inputs.name: _amount
inputs.description: an amount of tokens (resources) a receiver wants to get

abiDocs.name: withdraw
abiDocs.notice: Withdraws some amount of tokens from wallet's account using ERC20 tokens
